$$cos\left(x\right) = \sum_{n=0}^{\infty}{\frac{x^{2n}}{2n!}\left(-1\right)^{n}}$$
$$sin\left(x\right) = \sum_{n=0}^{\infty}{\frac{\left(-1\right)^{n}}{\left(2n+1\right)!}x^{2n+1}}$$
